channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Hello i need some help with updateing or makeing my ban/mute/ban ip system complete and so it all works. post any tuts if possible not requesting it though.
i just need some help on that and
how do i add a server saver so it saves the players that connect? need a tut if possible on that. or post help.
thanks![br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2007, 03:09:49 PM[/size][hr]someone please help?
